sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a trapezium.
message_1: A trapezium has two parallel sides of length 9 cm and 15 cm, and two non-parallel sides of length 7 cm each. Find the perimeter of the trapezium.
message_2:
To find the perimeter of the trapezium, we simply add the lengths of all four sides together.

Perimeter = (9 cm) + (15 cm) + (7 cm) + (7 cm)

Perimeter = 38 cm

The perimeter of the trapezium is 38 cm.
